DOC.HEADLINE: WEEKEND TV ; CNN GIVES VIEW OF SOUTH_AFRICA ' S FUTURE
DOC.TEXT: In a prelude to the historic South_African elections , CNN will telecast " CNN Presents : South_Africa : Electing the Future , " Sunday at 6 p.m. Host Susan Rook and CNN environmental correspondents David Mattingly and Joe Oliver travel_to South_Africa to explore the historical , personal and environmental issues of the country . In sports , ESPN will televise the National Football_League draft Sunday at 12:30 p.m. Chris Berman , Joe Theismann , Tom Jackson and Mel Kiper report from New York . N.F. MENDOZA
